properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM ,DECODE (MEMBER_GENDER,'M','남','여') MEMBER_GENDER FROM "MEMBER" WHERE UNREGISTER_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_NM =?, MEMBER_GENDER =? WHERE MEMBER_NO =?
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_PW =? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET UNREGISTER_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_PW = ? AND MEMBER_NO =?
